plugin.name: DynamicPlayList
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlists
plugin.desc: This plugin lets you play continuous music mixes based on selection criteria defined in so-called dynamic playlists. Comes with a number of ready-to-use dynamic playlists. In addition you can now import/use your own custom dynamic playlist definitions directly in DPL without any other intermediary plugins. More information on the github page.
plugin.creator: AF
